title: times Royals proved they're just like us
text:
The Queen, Meghan Markle, Kate Middleton, Princes Charles, William and Harry always seem completely at ease in front of the cameras - but it's not always perfect

Years and years of experience mean the Royal Family know exactly what they're doing when it comes to official events, engagements and Royal Tours.

They smile, shake hands, cut ribbons and plant trees seamlessly while grinning for the perfect photos for the press and well-wishers, which are shared around the globe in seconds.

But very, very occasionally things don't quite go to plan.

They're only human after all, which means they sometimes fall victim to the odd trip, stumble, and embarrassing moment.

The Queen, Duchess of Cambridge, Meghan Markle, Princes William and Harry and other members of the Royal Family have all suffered from the occasion slip-up.

And far from being embarrassing, these lovely candid shots are always the best - as they show that they are just like everyone else after all.
